comments: Great Professor. Extremely knowledgeable in what he is talking about. Helped me with anything I asked him.

Kustanovich is awesome. He is clear and to the point. He worries more about you understanding the format, rather then your creativity. He is extremely helpful and i recommend that everyone take him for screen writing. You will have a great experience.
Great professor. Dedicated, funny, insightful, etc. One of the best experiences I\'ve ever had in the classroom.
